name: re4-toolset
description: Toolset for modders of Resident Evil 4

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . Resident Evil 4 Toolset --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=icons/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=HardRain --version-string.FileDescription=Toolset --version-string.ProductName='Resident Evil 4 Toolset' --version-string.OriginalFilename='Resident Evil 4 Toolset'

author: HardRain
